scoringPlays.text: Deebo Samuel 68 Yd pass from Jake Bentley (Alexander Woznick PAT failed)
Benny Snell Jr. 5 Yd Run (Austin MacGinnis Kick)
Benny Snell Jr. 1 Yd Run (Austin MacGinnis Kick)

videos.headline: Kentucky's Snell Jr. takes direct snap for second score
videos.description: Lined up in the wildcat formation, RB Benny Snell Jr. powers into the end zone from one yard out to score a TD.

videos.headline: Coach Stoops happy with team's composure in first half
videos.description: After giving up an early South Carolina TD, Kentucky coach Mark Stoops says his team showed poise and composure and has played good football since.

videos.headline: Johnson finds Richardson to set up Kentucky field goal
videos.description: Kentucky QB Stephen Johnson passes to WR Tavin Richardson to convert on third down, setting up a Kentucky field goal.

videos.headline: Kentucky makes goal-line stand
videos.description: On fourth-and-goal from the one-yard line, the Kentucky defense swarms to prevent Rico Dowdle from reaching the goal line.

videos.headline: Deebo Samuel leaves game with ankle injury
videos.description: The South Carolina star receiver briefly returned, then had to go to the locker room for examinations. He had five catches for 122 yard and a TD.

videos.headline: Read-option QB run sets up Kentucky field goal
videos.description: Kentucky QB Stephen Johnson keeps the ball and rushes for 22 yards to set up a Kentucky field goal.

videos.headline: Fourth down TD brings South Carolina back into game
videos.description: QB Jake Bentley finds OrTre Smith in the corner for a nine-yard score in the fourth quarter.

videos.headline: Johnson's scramble sets up Kentucky field goal
videos.description: Kentucky QB Stephen Johnson steps up and scrambles for 54 yards into the South Carolina red zone.

videos.headline: Kentucky seals victory with interception
videos.description: Derrick Baity intercepts a Jake Bentley pass securing a Kentucky victory over South Carolina.
